name: Spmsgbox-1.0.4
tagline: Customized Model Message Box for Web Applications
body:
### Welcome to SPMsgBox. The SpMsgBox plugin is useful for all Web Applications. you can customize what you like. u just want to include the jquery and Style sheet with images. it is easiest one for display a alert messages in your Web Applications. You can Customize the dialog what you like!..
For More options see Demo **[Here]**(http://www.prabhusiva.in/2014/12/jmsgbox-examples.html):
Simply add in your web page in any event..
### Syntax:
### For Show
``` $.SPMsgBox.Show("Message","Title"); ``` ### For ShowSuccess
``` $.SPMsgBox.ShowSuccess("Message","Title"); ``` ### For ShowError
``` $.SPMsgBox.ShowError("Message","Title"); ``` ### For ShowWarning
``` $.SPMsgBox.ShowWarning("Message","Title"); ``` ### For ShowInfo
``` $.SPMsgBox.ShowInfo("Message","Title"); ``` ### Options
Use $.SPMsgBox.options={}; for Setting all the Options for Your Page
Use Options in Layout page Or in Each Page for setting the properties what you like
``` $.SPMsgBox.options = { "autoHide": false, "progressBar": true, "hideCloseIcon": false, "position": "top-right", "stayTime": "3000", "inEffectDuration": "600", "bkColor1": "#1c95eb", "pBarColor": "#b5f507", "Msg": "You like this Dialog" }; ``` ### Available in Nuget
``` Search SpMsgBox... ``` ### Dependencies :
You have to use the Jquery script (above 1.11.11 versions)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
